etymology.description: simplified and variant traditional form of 廈(廈) (xià, "mansion")
etymology.interpretation: 厦(廈) (xià, "mansion") is both a simplified and variant traditional form. The character retains the meaning and essence of grandeur associated with a mansion.

examples.chinese: 那座老厦矗立在小镇中心(那座老廈矗立在小鎮中心)。
examples.pinyin: Nà zuò lǎo xià chùlì zài xiǎo zhèn zhōngxīn.
examples.english: That old mansion stands in the center of the small town.

examples.chinese: 他梦想拥有一座宽敞的厦(他夢想擁有一座寬敞的廈)，举办盛大的晚宴(舉辦盛大的晚宴)。
examples.pinyin: Tā mèngxiǎng yōngyǒu yī zuò kuānchǎng de xià, jǔbàn shèngdà de wǎnyàn.
examples.english: He dreams of owning a spacious mansion, where he can host a grand banquet.
